Class AimCheckerLPattern

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.model.aimStrategy.AimCheckerLPattern
All Implemented Interfaces:
AimChecker
public class AimCheckerLPattern extends Object implements AimChecker
Class that implements the method for calculating how many times the L pattern occurs in a player grid

  • Method Details

    • check

      public int check(PrivateBoard privateBoard, List<CardElements> checkResources, String rotation)
      Description copied from interface: AimChecker
      This is the method that calculate how many times a pattern of an aimCard occurs on the player grid
      Specified by:
      check in interface AimChecker
      Parameters:
      privateBoard - is the board of the player with grid of cards and map of resources that the player has
      checkResources - is a list of the resources that the aimCard require
      rotation - is a string that indicate how the path is oriented
      Returns:
      the number of times that the pattern is verified

    • neighborsCord

      public static ArrayList<Coordinates> neighborsCord(ResourceCard toCheck, String rotation)
      This method set the coordinates that we have to check based on the rotation of the pattern we are checking
      Parameters:
      toCheck - is the card that we are checking
      rotation - is a string that indicate how the path is oriented
      Returns:
      an array list of the coordinates where are the cards we want to check

    • findNeighbors

      public static ArrayList<ResourceCard> findNeighbors(ArrayList<ResourceCard> tempGrid, ArrayList<Coordinates> nextCord, List<CardElements> checkResources)
      This method check if the card at the coordinates we calculate before respect the requirements that the aim card asks for
      Parameters:
      tempGrid - is a copy of the player private board
      nextCord - are coordinate where we have to check
      checkResources - are the resources required by the aim card
      Returns:
      an array list that contains cards with all the requirements the aim card asks for
